price: 你们当量力地敬畏安拉，你们当听从他的教训和命令，你们当施舍，那是有益于你们自己的。能戒除自身的贪吝者，确是成功的。
arabic: فَٱتَّقُواْ ٱللَّهَ مَا ٱسۡتَطَعۡتُمۡ وَٱسۡمَعُواْ وَأَطِيعُواْ وَأَنفِقُواْ خَيۡرٗا لِّأَنفُسِكُمۡۗ وَمَن يُوقَ شُحَّ نَفۡسِهِۦ فَأُوْلَٰٓئِكَ هُمُ ٱلۡمُفۡلِحُونَ

version.title: Chinese Translation - Muhammad Makin
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Chinese by Muhammad Makin. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: fa-ittaqū al-laha mā is'taṭaʿtum wa-is'maʿū wa-aṭīʿū wa-anfiqū khayran li-anfusikum waman yūqa shuḥḥa nafsihi fa-ulāika humu al-muf'liḥūna
